verbs.description: [ARG0: iranians] [V: find] [ARG1: joy] [ARGM-LOC: in serving pilgrims on road to karbala a 15-minute walk from the iraqi border in the west iranian town of mehran] three young clerics are hard at work polishing the shoes of pilgrims mohammad taghi ganji pakistan semnan iran revolutionary guards hussein ibn ali prime minister azerbaijan muhammad mehran imam hussein karbala qom iraq saddam hussein caliph yazid ali nujuki mohsen mohebbi mehran ilam isfahan afp arbaeen
